entry.title: The Fragility of Innocence
entry.summary:
Author: httphowell

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 42,485Chapters: 10/27Kudos: 63

Summary: Merlin, the crown prince of Camelot, is renowned for his beauty and grace but lives a sheltered life under the watchful eye of his father, King Balinor, who views him as fragile. Unaware of the world beyond the castle walls, Merlin’s life changes when the brave knight Arthur enters the picture, showing him the depth of love and teaching him to find his own voice.Together, they must face the trials that come their way.

entry.title: right hand man
entry.summary:
Author: dilucsasshair

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,574Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 11

Summary: "Merlin was hiding something from Arthur, and although the court mage denied his avoidant behavior, the young king knew when the other was fibbing.The problem was, this avoidance only reared its head when they were intimate. Whether they were snogging in a castle corridor or the privacy of their rooms, Merlin always cut the event short. Sometimes he’d get handsy with Arthur; he’d used his mouth in particularly heated moments, but he never let Arthur reciprocate."Set ten years after Morgana's war, the two idiots navigate a budding relationship. Complete with another one of Merlin's secrets, Arthur's young heir, and a kingdom thriving in an age of magic.

entry.title: The Royal Bake off
entry.summary:
Author: httphowell

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,006Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 16

Summary: "You’ve seen how you try to boss around the kitchen staff. I thought it was time you learned the real way to command a kitchen. Baking is all about finesse, precision, and—" he paused for dramatic effect, "—a gentle touch."Arthur gave him a dubious look, folding his arms across his chest. "Merlin, I’m the future king of Camelot, not a baker. What do I need with your... gentle touch?"Merlin tilted his head, looking Arthur up and down with playful scrutiny. "Well, you are about to be king, aren’t you? What better way to show off your... talents than by baking a cake? Imagine, Prince Arthur, ruler of Camelot... and baker extraordinaire." He winked, clearly enjoying himself. "You’ll be the talk of the court."----------Arthur and Merlin turn a baking lesson into a playful battle of wits and frosting, filled with teasing and flirtation. What starts as a mess becomes a sweet, imperfect creation that's theirs alone.

Author: thesongistheriver

Or he would be, if the photographer hadn't acted like such a jerk. (Too bad he's hot.)~*~*~Arthur loves being a photographer, but he hates everyone only using him to make them famous. entry.title: The Past and Future King
entry.summary:
Author: SigniorBenedickofPadua

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 64,290Chapters: 23/23Kudos: 35

Summary: Merlin had failed. Despite all his efforts, Arthur had ended up dead in his arms on the shores of Avalon, so close to salvation. Surely, this could not be how their shared destiny was supposed to end? No, it was all Merlin’s fault—he had made all the wrong choices, misinterpreting prophecy after prophecy. If only he could go back and try again, now that he knew better, maybe he could right his wrongs. Maybe he— Oh. Maybe he could go back…Ignoring Kilgharrah’s protests about the impossibility of what he aimed to do, Merlin let all his power loose, becoming one with the fabric of the world and the magic he was born of. After following the bond he shared with Arthur through the winding paths of time, he finally emerged a decade into the past, having successfully seized a second chance to get this whole destiny thing right. Unfortunately, he would have to win Arthur’s trust all over again, seeing as Merlin was alone in remembering anything of the future he was hoping to change. Or…was he?

entry.title: When love blossoms
entry.summary:
Author: Trialbyname

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 72,534Chapters: 45/51Kudos: 304

Summary: "I command you again," Sir Leon let out, "Show yourselves!"Arthur rose first, his movements slow and careful. Merlin, after having gotten over the initial surprise, mirrored Arthurs movements, rising from his spot with both hands over his head. And he got to take in the ever so glorious sight of the four knights, looking between the two of them in pure confusion."I am truly sorry if we were a bother to you, sir knight." Arthur let out, a small tone of mockery in his voice."How-how is this...?" Gwaine let out, "How is this possible?"---Once upon a time, a choice was made. A choice that would have held consequences for the kingdom of Camelot, and everyone who lived there, had it gone through. But it didn't.But now, Merlin and Arthur find themselves in an alternate universe where it did.

entry.title: The Sorcerer Who Was Her
entry.summary:
Author: SChryslerS

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 83,332Chapters: 34/?Kudos: 486

Summary: The great and wise sorcerer, the closest confidant and most trusted ally of King Arthur, was born a girl. This single truth changes nothing—his wisdom remains boundless, his power undiminished, his destiny unshaken. And yet, it changes everything, for within this paradox lies a secret, a force beyond mere magic, one that reshapes not only his own fate but the fate of the world itself.

entry.title: Wooden Dragons
entry.summary:
Author: CaffeinatedFlumadiddle

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,030Chapters: 1/10Kudos: 203

Summary: “You-” Ygraine said, stepping up to point a finger in Uther’s face. “You are a liar and a murderer. The fact someone as sweet and caring as Vivienne is destined to marry you is a tragedy in itself, but if you expect me to hand over my brother’s rightful claim to Camelot’s throne-”“My claim to Camelot’s throne,” Uther threw back, face growing more red as Arthur looked between his parents in utter bewilderment. Merlin didn’t blame him. He had envisioned Uther and Ygraine’s love story to be more… well, less based in war and battles.Ygraine’s eyes narrowed as she grabbed a goblet of wine and threw it in Uther’s face. A few of the guards shifted, but Uther only raised a hand to pause them, spitting out the wine with furious eyes.“You,” Ygraine said coldly. “Are unworthy to sit upon a stool, let alone a throne.”From a few feet away, Balinor scoffed as he sipped from his own goblet. “I kind of like having her as a hostage, Uther. She livens up the place.”OrIn a desperate attempt to save Arthur at Camlann, Merlin tries to reverse time. It works perhaps a tad too well.

entry.title: How Many Secrets Can You Keep?
entry.summary:
Author: ThordisPotter

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,937Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 119

Summary: Clearly Arthur agrees, because he frowns in confusion. "I know that we don't speak about it often, but it can't be that shocking."Elyan frowns. "Don't talk about it often? This entire kingdom does nothing but talk about it. Your father had it outlawed, Arthur."What?"Had it outlawed? Really?" Percival asks, and Leon's expression surely mirrors Arthur and Percival's. "I knew it was frowned upon, but I didn't think it was outlawed."There's a beat of silence, where everyone is looking very confusedly at one another, and Leon is beginning to think that they're not all having the same conversation.-----Or, in which Arthur tries to stage an intervention for Merlin, but the Knights can't figure out whether the intervention is about Merlin's magic or his sexuality.-----Inspired by a Tumblr post by bamboozledcorvid (see beginning notes)Title from Do I Wanna Know by Arctic Monkeys

entry.title: the pale morning sings of forgotten things
entry.summary:
Author: habituallywastingtime

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 68,550Chapters: 9/16Kudos: 143

Summary: It’s a daily battle, reigning in his magic.But there is something wrong with his magic and there is something wrong with Merlin.As Merlin finishes working the buckles on Arthur’s armor, he feels a creaking in his bones.The moment Balinor’s pulse finally stilled on the forest floor, Merlin’s magic changed. No longer is his magic a flower waiting to bloom in his cupped palms, it’s an animal backed into a corner waiting to sink its teeth into the ones who put it there. The mutt at his feet has lost its patience.There’s a flint being struck under his skin, generating sparks, seeking dry brush to ignite and swallow in flame.Merlin is terrified.He isn’t a seer, never mastered the art of scrying, but even he knows something is looming over the horizon.or Merlin’s Dragonlord powers let him shift into a dragon, things go to shit, and then there are more dragons.

entry.title: The Threads Between Us
entry.summary:
Author: a_written_simulacra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 63,601Chapters: 10/12Kudos: 1,136

Summary: Morgana ties Arthur's life to Merlin's, thinking that it'll be much easier to kill a helpless servant than the King of Camelot.Aka, Morgana unwittingly binds Arthur's life to the most powerful sorcerer to walk the earth.Aka, not only can they physically not leave each other's sides, but also anything Merlin feels, so does Arthur--and vice versa.

entry.title: A secret third thing
entry.summary:
Author: Padfootandpr0ng

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,839Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 25

Summary: "Fine. I'll help," Merlin finally says, annoyance etched across his face, "But I'm doing this for Gwen, not you"."Great!" Arthur announces triumphantly, without so much as thinking about thanking Merlin, "So when do we start?""Right now," Merlin declares, before continuing his speed walk down the corridor, forcing Arthur to rush after him once more, scrambling to keep up."Can you stop running off for one second?" Arthur complained, falling into step beside Merlin and glaring at him slightly.Merlin rolled his eye's, "Are you always this demanding?""Are you always this infuriating?" Arthur shot back, glare intensifying as if Merlin hadn't literally just agreed to help him. OR Gwen conicves Merlin to tutor his rival Arthur Pendragon, they become begrudging friends and eventually something much more than that.
